before.label: Before
before.description: Add text before the content field.

after.label: After
after.description: Add text after the content field.

search.label: Search
search.description: Select a predefined search pattern or enter a custom string or regular expression to search for. The regular expression has to be enclosed between slashes. For example `my-string` or `/ab+c/`.

replace.label: Replace
replace.description: Enter the replacement string which may contain references. If left empty, the search matches will be removed.

limit.label: Content Length
limit.description: Limit the content length to a number of characters. All HTML elements will be stripped.

date.label: Date Format
date.description: Select a predefined date format or enter a custom format.
